results.title: 3D Elastomeric Stent Functionalized with Antioxidative and Perivascular Tissue Regenerative Activities Ameliorated PVT Deprivation-Induced Vein Graft Failure.
results.text_hl: Locally administering @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on vein grafts through 3D-printed external stent (PGS-PCL) shows antioxidative and anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ properties to protect cells from @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@ invasion, thereafter decreasing acute @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@.
